summary: Adds purpose to the heal other spells.
descriptionHtml:
With this mod once an essential charecter is down they are down until
1 you heal them with a heal other spell
2 you change cells

Downed allies will automatically follow you again after being downed once you go into another cell, Once there down there out until cell change or healed.
Good for people who want to roleplay healers.

Bugs:
Sometimes you have to hit the npc once or twice to get the healing effect to work
healing essential downed horses doesnt have an animation, Downed horses just stay static until healed.
author: thelawfull
